titles.title: Now none but Christ can satisfy

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Christ, in Thee my soul hath found, And found in Thee alone, The peace, the joy I sought so long, The bliss till now unknown.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Now none but Christ can satisfy, None other name for me; There’s love and life and lasting joy, Lord Jesus, found in Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I sighed for rest and happiness, I yearned for them, not Thee; But, while I passed my Savior by, His love laid hold on me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I tried the broken cisterns, Lord, But, ah, the waters failed! E’en as I stooped to drink they fled, And mocked me as I wailed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The pleasures lost I sadly mourned, But never wept for Thee, Till grace the sightless eyes received, Thy loveliness to see.
